DOMComponentItem.name: MovieClips/ScrollableText
DOMComponentItem.parametersAsXML: <property id="actAsButton"> <Inspectable name="actAsButton" variable="actAsButton" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="false" type="Boolean"/> </property> <property id="defaultText"> <Inspectable name="defaultText" variable="defaultText" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="" type="Default"/> </property> <property id="disabled"> <Inspectable name="disabled" variable="disabled" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="false" type="Boolean"/> </property> <property id="editable"> <Inspectable name="editable" variable="editable" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="false" type="Boolean"/> </property> <property id="enableInitCallback"> <Inspectable name="enableInitCallback" variable="enableInitCallback" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="true" type="Boolean"/> </property> <property id="maxChars"> <Inspectable name="maxChars" variable="maxChars" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="0.000000" type="Number"/> </property> <property id="inspectableScrollBar"> <Inspectable name="inspectableScrollBar" variable="inspectableScrollBar" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="scrollbar" type="Default"/> </property> <property id="scrollPolicy"> <Inspectable name="scrollPolicy" variable="scrollPolicy" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="auto" type="Default"/> </property> <property id="soundMap"> <Inspectable name="soundMap" variable="soundMap" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="scroll" type="Array"/> </property> <property id="textID"> <Inspectable name="textID" variable="textID" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="" type="Default"/> </property> <property id="visible"> <Inspectable name="visible" variable="visible" category="" verbose="0" defaultValue="true" type="Boolean"/> </property>
